constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 193 (Wednesday, November 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DELGADO:
H.R. 5839.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H6179]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Charles R. Johnson for acts of valor during the Korean War while a member of the Army.
